channel.title: spatial analysis on Jakob Richter
channel.description: Recent content in spatial analysis on Jakob Richter

item.title: Analyzing geo data on a street level performed on an example of road accidents in London
item.description: In my bachelor thesis I developed an algorithm that was able to map observations that were given by latitude and longitude data to the according street segment. This yields a much more insightful visualization that a normal heat-map or individual points.
